statements: SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_programs;
SELECT program_name, recycling_rate FROM e_waste_recycling_programs WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date IS NULL;
SELECT program_id, program_name, reward_points FROM e_waste_recycling_programs ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, recycling_rate FROM e_waste_recycling_programs WHERE recycling_rate < 90 ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date IS NULL ORDER BY program_name ASC
SELECT program_name, recycling_rate FROM e_waste_recycling_programs WHERE recycling_rate >= 80 ORDER BY program_name DESC
SELECT program_name, reward_points FROM e_waste_recycling_programs WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY reward_points DESC
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_programs WHERE end_date IS NULL AND reward_points < 100 ORDER BY program_name ASC, start_date DESC
SELECT program_name, recycling_rate, start_date FROM e_waste_recycling_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND reward_points >= 50 ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM ewaste_recycling_incentives
SELECT program_id, program_name, incentive_type FROM ewaste_recycling_incentives WHERE recycling_target > 100
SELECT user_id, user_name, total_points FROM user_rewards ORDER BY user_name DESC
SELECT program_name, recycling_target, reward_points FROM ewaste_recycling_incentives WHERE reward_points >= 50
SELECT * FROM user_rewards WHERE last_activity_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM ewaste_recycling_incentives WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, incentive_type, recycling_target FROM ewaste_recycling_incentives WHERE recycling_target > 100;
SELECT * FROM ewaste_recycling_incentives ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT user_name, total_points FROM user_rewards WHERE last_activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, incentive_type, reward_points FROM ewaste_recycling_incentives WHERE program_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_program;
SELECT program_name, reward_points FROM e_waste_recycling_program ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM recyclable_materials WHERE recycling_fee > 0;
SELECT id, material_name FROM recyclable_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'Plastic%';
SELECT user_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM user_rewards GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_program WHERE reward_points > 100 ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, incentive_description FROM e_waste_recycling_program WHERE reward_points BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY reward_points DESC;
SELECT program_name, reward_points, material_name FROM e_waste_recycling_program JOIN recyclable_materials ON e_waste_recycling_program.id = recyclable_materials.id WHERE recycling_fee < 5.00;
SELECT program_name, SUM(reward_points) AS total_points FROM e_waste_recycling_program GROUP BY program_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_points DESC;

SELECT u.user_id, r.points_earned, r.redeemable_rewards FROM user_rewards r JOIN e_waste_recycling_program p ON r.points_earned >= p.reward_points JOIN recyclable_materials m ON m.id = p.id JOIN (SELECT user_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM user_rewards GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(points_earned) > 500) u ON u.user_id = r.user_id ORDER BY r.points_earned DESC;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_programs;
SELECT program_name, reward_points FROM e_waste_programs WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM e_waste_programs WHERE program_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM recycling_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT location_name, address, city, state, zipcode FROM recycling_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_programs;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM e_waste_programs WHERE reward_points > 100;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_rewards ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state, zipcode FROM recycling_locations WHERE city = 'New York';

SELECT user_name, program_name, participation_date FROM user_rewards JOIN program_participation ON user_rewards.user_id = program_participation.user_id JOIN e_waste_programs ON program_participation.program_id = e_waste_programs.program_id;
SELECT * FROM e_waste_recycling_programs;
SELECT program_name, incentive_type, start_date FROM e_waste_recycling_programs;
SELECT * FROM recycling_centers WHERE location = 'City';
SELECT center_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM recycling_centers ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, email, joined_date FROM users WHERE country = 'Country' ORDER BY joined_date DESC;
SELECT program_name, incentive_type, incentive_value FROM e_waste_recycling_programs ORDER BY incentive_value DESC, start_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, category, recycle_value FROM e_waste_items WHERE recycle_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT center_name, location, contact_person, contact_number FROM recycling_centers WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT username, email, city, country FROM users WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY joined_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT program_name, incentive_type, start_date, end_date FROM e_waste_recycling_programs WHERE start_date < '2022-09-01' AND end_date > '2022-09-30';
